about_the_game:
The Sandwich Making Experience is an asymmetrical party game that is designed to bring instant entertainment to any gathering. In The Sandwich Making Experience, players take turn being the sandwich maker, while the others play as the sandwich breaker, both competing to complete their objectives.

Prepare to enter a sandwich making extravaganza!
Compete head-to-head with your friends in this local party game to prove that you are the best at making sandwiches under pressure and under attack! Enter the kitchen to cook it out in a 1v1 (or up to 1v4 with controllers) where anything goes winner takes all in a battle to the death (not really it is a competition and nobody hopefully dies).


Maker (VR)
Try your best to make a randomly selected sandwich against before the time runs out. Cook and stack your way to victory! Use your height to your advantage and be careful not to let leave anything unattended for too long, you have a little friend who is eagerly waiting to cause some trouble! and be careful not to start any fires...

Breaker (Keyboard)
Prevent the maker from making a sandwich at any cost! Use your small height and slippery speed to your advantage as you do everything in your power to be the biggest nuisance to the maker as possible!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • VR Support: Supported Quest 1/2 and HP Reverb 2 with OpenXR
  • Additional Notes: VR Headset is required. May be compatible with other headsets.
